content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good afternoon, Nesibe. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement on the rental price. May I ask for your budget and how long you plan to stay in the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 300 Euros per month and I plan to stay for 12 months. Can you give me a proposal?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Nesibe. Based on the size of the apartment and your length of stay, I propose a monthly rental price of 320 Euros. This price takes into account the maintenance costs and the potential for occupancy rate fluctuations. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, it is within my budget. Can we finalize the agreement? I agree to the price of 320 Euros per month.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Excellent, Nesibe. I'm glad we could come to an agreement. The rental agreement will be drafted and sent to you for review and signature. Once you sign, we can proceed with the move-in process. Do you have any questions or concerns before we finalize the agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine
